SkyMotion bụ ngwa mkpanaka na-akọwa ihu ígwè nke ụlọ ọrụ Canada Sky Motion Research Inc mepụtara
A tọhapụrụ usoro ngwa mkpanaka ya, SkyMotion, màkà usoro iOS nke Apple n'Ọgọstụ 2012. Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ emeela ma wepụta ụdị màkà sistemụ arụmọrụ gam akporo, ya na ụdị desktọọpụ.

SkyMotion na-agbaso ma na-ebu amụma mmiri ozuzo niile na United States na Canada n'ogè, na-eji Doppler weather radars na ngwaọrụ ndị ọzọ na-ahụ màkà ihu ígwé. Ọ na-ebu amụma ugbu a na mmiri ozuzo, snow, mmiri ozuzo oyi, ice pellets, na akụ́ mmiri igwe.
Iji hụ na ónyé ọrụ ọ bụla ziri ezi, ngwá ahụ na-agbaso ọnọdụ na mpaghara square kilomita
A na-egosipụta amụma ahụ n'otu, ise, na nkeji iri na ise n'ime windo awa abụọ.
André Leblanc, onye natara ònyìnyé Academy màkà mmepe na mmejuputa ngwaahịa Flame, Flint na Inferno, hiwere Sky Motion Research Inc n'afọ 2008.
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2013, AccuWeather nwetara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
